title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view and deleting the same file from the outline image, the image is not refreshed or updated.
EB: The image 'image1.jpg' should be refreshed or updated after it is imported again with the file renamed to 'image2.jpg'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view. 
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image. 
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'. 
4. Import 'image1.jpg' into the layout view again.
